Row.Text: Have 1 Settlement with at least five [B]Specialists[/B].
[B]Specialists[/B] were an important part of [B]Qajar's[/B] identity.

In the centuries of {1_Civilization_Adj} rule, nomads from near lands have found service and eventually wealth, especially in the {1_Civilization_Adj} military. They form their own guarded clan, no longer in tents on the plains, but in salons and universities.
[B]Xerxes[/B] ruled the region that would become [B]Qajar Iran[/B].
